entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
